channel.title: teaching on A.B.
channel.description: Recent content in teaching on A.B.

item.title: A Practical Introduction to Probability Theory (minicourse)
item.author: web@bochkarev.io (Alexey A. Bochkarev)
item.description: This is a quick numerical intro to probability theory in the form of a mini-course, four one-hour sessions. Designed for SMTB and Puschino Winter School in 2021. Discussing mathematical models for random things from the perspective of numerical examples in Python.

item.title: ðŸ’¬ OR Tech Seminar: outline
item.author: web@bochkarev.io (Alexey A. Bochkarev)
item.description: A quick note on OR Tech Seminar topics and logistics.

item.title: A Glimpse into Algorithms (minicourse)
item.author: web@bochkarev.io (Alexey A. Bochkarev)
item.description: This is a quick computational intro to algorithms and data structures in the form of a mini-course, four one-hour sessions. Designed and presented for SMTB in 2020 and 2021. Quick numerical illustrations for runtime, correctness, and other such fun things.
